br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.model.enemies

Class Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.model.enemies.Action
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Json.Serializable

    public class Action
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Json.Serializable
    An Action indicates what the Enemy should do through value attribution. Examples of Actions are: use the bottom lane; invoke card DR-002; use the nearest available tile to the base.

      Dynamic values such as random ones are retrieved during battles.
